body.name: Office Wall Decor, Inspirational Wall Art for Women, Motivational Decorations for Work, Home Office Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
features: You Will Receive: 1 set of positive affirmations wall decor (4 pieces), each with a different color and inspirational words printed on it, which can meet your diverse decorative needs.

Suitable Size: Each piece of the cubile decor is approximately 11.8 x 3.9 inches / 30 x 10 cm in size, with a thickness of 0.2 inches / 0.5 cm. It is abundant in quantity and has a variety of styles, which can meet your daily home decoration needs.
Reliable and Sturdy: The office signs are made of wooden materials, natural materials make you feel at ease, safe and odorless, sturdy and durable, not easy to break, damage, and fade.
Inspirational Quotes: This office pictures wall decor adds a lovely and inspiring atmosphere to your home or office, serving as a great reminder and bringing warmth to your life.

Beautiful Decoration: These wooden plaques can be widely hung on walls, doors, hallways, entrances, living rooms, offices, and other places, and are also suitable for outdoor use, such as courtyards, windows, or other places.
body.description: FeaturesThe wooden hanging wall sign consists of 4 different colored wooden boards, tightly strung with string, with positive words printed on them.Ability is what you can do: This quote emphasizes the importance of recognizing one's own abilities and potential. It suggests that knowing what you can do is the first step towards success.Motivation determines what you do: This statement emphasizes the role of motivation in driving action. It suggests that your level of motivation affects the choices you make and the actions you take.Perseverance is what keeps you going in the face of challenges: This quote emphasizes the importance of perseverance in overcoming obstacles. It suggests that remaining determined and resilient is essential to achieving long-term goals.Passion is the fuel that drives you to excel in what you love: This quote emphasizes the power of passion in driving excellence. It suggests that when you are passionate about something, you are more likely to invest the time and energy to excel.These four quotes capture important aspects of personal growth, achievement and success.Hang these inspirational wooden signs on walls, doors, hallways, entrances, living rooms, offices and other places to always motivate yourself to success. They are also suitable for outdoor use such as patios, windows or other places for a quaint and elegant style.Product SpecificationColor: as shown in the pictureMaterial: WoodSize: 11.8 x 3.9 inches / 30 x 10 cmThickness: 0.2 inches / 0.5 cmPackage IncludesOffice Wall Decor x 1Warm tips: Manual measurement, the size of the slight error.Due to the different screens, the color may be slightly different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Home Decor
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for our homeschool space because my daughter struggles with negative self-talk and I have been adding affirmations to our space to help with her mindset. It came exactly as described/pictured and I have it hanging above our reading tent. I reference it daily and my daughter enjoys reading the words and meaning behind the words on the sign. It really makes a difference in our space and it is also visually appealing - I'm glad we chose this from all of the options we looked at!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Dollar Store Quality, Save your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice decoration. Colors are perfect.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for my wife's office and she has a similar color scheme. This isn't too big of a piece of wall art, so doesn't take a ton of room up, only about 12" wide. Overall the quality isn't too bad. It isn't like you will be touching it all the time and playing with it. You put it up and it stays. For the price point of under $15, you're looking at a nice little accent for a home or office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the classroom.
reviews.reviewText: I have calming colors in my classroom and I just LOVE this sign. It fit perfectly in the awkward little sink alcove.
